paper_abstract: As an extension of To separation axiom in general topology, R To axiom and s-T-0 axiom were introduced in I-fuzzy topological spaces by Yue and Fang [On separation axioms in I-fuzzy topological spaces, Fuzzy Sets and Systems 157 (2006) 780-793]. In this note, it is proved that the R To axiom and the s-T-0 axiom are equivalent to each other. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on "On separation axioms in I-fuzzy topological spaces"
